testsuite.name: Evaluating move
testsuite.details: The test suite contains test cases for testing evaluating move functionality.

testcase.name: Check simple two-letter move
testcase.summary: The test case for check correctness of eveluating simple two-letter move
testcase.preconditions:
1. The user should be connected to the internet.

2. The user should have cloned application from https://git.e-science.pl/rlis241385_dpp/rlis_flaskapi

3. The user should locally run application by typing "flask run" in command line

step.actions: Open http://localhost:5000/game/view website
step.expectedresults: The website should be opened and the board should be visible

step.actions: Add user to the game ("Dodaj uczestnika do gry" button)
step.expectedresults: User should be added and info about him should be visible in the "Punktacja" section

step.actions: Make the move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "4:5:I;4:6:S" and click Ok
step.expectedresults: Move should be added to game log

step.actions: Check value of the move made in game log section
step.expectedresults: Value of the move made should be 2 (I - 1, S - 1)

testcase.name: Check five-letter move
testcase.preconditions:
1. The user should be connected to the internet.

2. The user should have cloned application from https://git.e-science.pl/rlis241385_dpp/rlis_flaskapi

3. The user should locally run application by typing "flask run" in command line

step.actions: Open http://localhost:5000/game/view website
step.expectedresults: The website should be opened and the board should be visible

step.actions: Add user to the game ("Dodaj uczestnika do gry" button)
step.expectedresults: User should be added and info about him should be visible in the "Punktacja" section

step.actions: Make the move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "1:5:R;2:5:A;3:5:D;4:5:E;5:5:K" and click Ok
step.expectedresults: Move should be added to game log

step.actions: Move should be added to game log
step.expectedresults: Value of the move made should be 13

testsuite.name: Adding user points
testsuite.details: The test suite contains test cases for testing adding user points.

testcase.name: Check user points after 2 moves
testcase.summary: Testing correctness of adding user points in 2 moves.
testcase.preconditions:
1. The user should be connected to the internet.

2. The user should have cloned application from https://git.e-science.pl/rlis241385_dpp/rlis_flaskapi

3. The user should locally run application by typing "flask run" in command line

step.actions: Open http://localhost:5000/game/view website
step.expectedresults: The website should be opened and the board should be visible

step.actions: Add user to the game ("Dodaj uczestnika do gry" button)
step.expectedresults: User should be added and info about him should be visible in the "Punktacja" section

step.actions: Make the move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "4:5:I;4:6:S" and click Ok
step.expectedresults: Move should be added to game log

step.actions: Make another move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "6:6:O;5:6:R" and click Ok
step.expectedresults: Move should be added to game log

step.actions: Check user points in "Punktacja" section in the column "Punkty"
step.expectedresults: Value in column "Punkty" should be 5

testcase.name: Check user points after 4 moves
testcase.summary: Testing correctness of adding user points in 4 moves.
testcase.preconditions:
1. The user should be connected to the internet.

2. The user should have cloned application from https://git.e-science.pl/rlis241385_dpp/rlis_flaskapi

3. The user should locally run application by typing "flask run" in command line

step.actions: Open http://localhost:5000/game/view website
step.expectedresults: The website should be opened and the board should be visible

step.actions: Add user to the game ("Dodaj uczestnika do gry" button)
step.expectedresults: User should be added and info about him should be visible in the "Punktacja" section

step.actions: Make the move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "4:5:I;4:6:S" and click Ok
step.expectedresults: Move should be added to game log

step.actions: Make another move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "6:6:O;5:6:R" and click Ok
step.expectedresults: Move should be added to game log

step.actions: Make another move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "1:5:R;2:5:A;3:5:D;4:5:E;5:5:K" and click Ok
step.expectedresults: Move should be added to game log

step.actions: Make another move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "1:1:R;1:2:O" and click Ok
step.expectedresults: Move should be added to game log

step.actions: Check user points in "Punktacja" section in the column "Punkty"
step.expectedresults: Value in column "Punkty" should be 21

testsuite.name: Adding artificial intelligence
testsuite.details: The test suite contains test cases for adding artificial intelligence to the game

testcase.name: Add at the begin
testcase.summary: Testing correctness of adding artificial intelligence at the beggining of the game.
testcase.preconditions:
1. The user should be connected to the internet.

2. The user should have cloned application from https://git.e-science.pl/rlis241385_dpp/rlis_flaskapi

3. The user should locally run application by typing "flask run" in command line

step.actions: Open http://localhost:5000/game/view website
step.expectedresults: The website should be opened and the board should be visible

step.actions: Add AI to the game ("Dodaj komputer do gry" button)
step.expectedresults: AI should be added and info about it should be visible in the "Punktacja" section

testsuite.name: Visibility of letters on the board
testsuite.details: The test suite contains test cases for testing visibility of letters on the board

testcase.name: Check visibility after first move
testcase.summary: Testing correctness of adding letters to the board after first move.
testcase.preconditions:
1. The user should be connected to the internet.

2. The user should have cloned application from https://git.e-science.pl/rlis241385_dpp/rlis_flaskapi

3. The user should locally run application by typing "flask run" in command line

step.actions: Open http://localhost:5000/game/view website
step.expectedresults: The website should be opened and the board should be visible

step.actions: Add user to the game ("Dodaj uczestnika do gry" button)
step.expectedresults: User should be added and info about him should be visible in the "Punktacja" section

step.actions: Make the move by typing in "Wyraz" text-field move "4:5:I;4:6:S" and click Ok
step.expectedresults:
Letters should be putted on the board this way:

4 row, 5 column - I

4 row, 6 column - S
